The theory classes should be in junit-4.5.jar.  Are you using the
version from the website?

Theories will continue to be supported.  As a matter of fact, upcoming
releases should help solve one of the chief drawbacks of their use,
which is that they force developers to choose between broad coverage
and fast runtimes.

   David Saff

On Tue, Oct 7, 2008 at 10:04 AM, Leo Uzcategui <leou@...> wrote:
> Hello,
> I'm interested in exploring the use of JUnit's theories. What is the
> status and future plans for this experimental feature?
> I noticed the Java src code is included in junit-4.5-src.jar but the
> compiled classes do not appear in junit-4.5.jar.
> I am also looking for usage examples or any comments from those with some
> experience using this feature.
> Thanks in advance,
> Leo
